programme.title: Barry Goldwater (1909-1998)
programme.short_synopsis: Remembering Barry Goldwater, the most influential presidential runner-up in US history.
programme.medium_synopsis: Remembering Barry Goldwater, Alistair Cooke considers a most memorable defeated presidential candidate -  the cowboy from Phoenix, Arizona who changed the Republican Party forever.
programme.long_synopsis: Remembering Barry Goldwater, Alistair Cooke considers a most memorable defeated presidential candidate -  the cowboy from Phoenix, Arizona who changed the Republican Party forever.
